text.section: An inmate who is sentenced to a local correctional facility shall be allowed an initial deduction from the inmate's term of confinement.

The deduction described in subsection (a) of this section shall be calculated:
from the first day of the inmate's postsentence commitment to the custody of the local correctional facility to the last day of the inmate's maximum term of confinement;
at the rate of 5 days for each calendar month; and
on a prorated basis for any portion of a calendar month.
